definition: not worthy of being chosen (especially as a spouse)
details:
adjective
- not worthy of being chosen (especially as a spouse)
= synonyms: undesirable
- not meant or adapted for a particular purpose
= example: not meant or adapted for a particular purpose
- not conducive to good moral development
= example: not conducive to good moral development
- not capable of being applied
= synonyms: inapplicable
